    • Field Detail

      • backendmodel

        public static cs213.photoAlbum.model.Backend backendmodel
        Backend object used to save and manipulate the data of all of the users. This object will hold the list of all of the users.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataControl

        public DataControl()
        The constructor. This will establish which user is currently being processed and will issue all data manipulation according to this specified user.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load()
        Loads the list of existing users from memory. (persistence)

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the list of existing users to memory. (persistence)

      • addTag

        public void addTag(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
          java.lang.String fileName,
          java.lang.String typeandval)
        Adds a tag to the specified photo by the tagType and the tagValue.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        fileName - the file path name for the photo object
        typeandval - the specific type and value of the tag to be added

      • deleteTag

        public void deleteTag(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
             java.lang.String fileName,
             java.lang.String typeandval)
        Deletes a tag of the specified photo with the given tagType and tagValue parameters.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        fileName - the file path name for the photo object
        typeandval - the specific type and value of the tag to be deleted

      • listPhotoInfo

        public void listPhotoInfo(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
                 java.lang.String fileName)
        Outputs all information about the specified fileName. Information includes file name, album(s) it belongs to, date it was created, caption, and tags. Tags are sorted by location first, then people, then others, sorted by tag value within each type.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        fileName - the file path name for the photo object

      • getPhotosByDate

        public void getPhotosByDate(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
                   java.lang.String startDate,
                   java.lang.String endDate)
        Retrieves all photos taken within a given range of dates, in chronological order.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        startDate - the first date to be checked
        endDate - the last date to be checked

      • getPhotosByTag

        public void getPhotosByTag(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
                  java.lang.String stringStream)
        Retrieves all photos that contain all the tags listed in stringStream. Listed in alphabetical order.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        stringStream - the desired tag(s) to search for

      • addPhoto

        public void addPhoto(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
            java.lang.String fileName,
            java.lang.String caption,
            java.lang.String albumName)
        Adds new photo to specified album. The absolute path of the photo is stored as the file name of the photo. All accesses to the photo MUST be specified with the absolute path. Note: The caption is a property of the photo, not the album. This means if you add a photo to more than one album, you specify the caption when adding to the first album. Then, when adding to subsequent albums, you specify an empty string for the caption, meaning that the caption is retained from the first add.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        fileName - the absolute path for the file of photo
        caption - the desired caption of the new photo
        albumName - the name of the album to be added to

      • removePhoto

        public void removePhoto(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
               java.lang.String fileName,
               java.lang.String albumName)
        Removes photo from specified album.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        fileName - the file path name for the photo object
        albumName - the name of the album containing the photo to be deleted

      • listPhotos

        public void listPhotos(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
              java.lang.String albumName)
        Lists all photos and their details in the specified album.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        albumName - the name of the album whose photos are to be printed

      • movePhoto

        public void movePhoto(cs213.photoAlbum.model.User user,
             java.lang.String fileName,
             java.lang.String oldAlbum,
             java.lang.String newAlbum)
        Moves photo from oldAlbum into newAlbum. If the photo already exists in newAlbum, returns without doing anything.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose photo albums are being accessed
        fileName - the path to the specified photo to be moved
        oldAlbum - the name of the album containing the photo to be moved
        newAlbum - the name of the desired album to add the photo to
